name: Ananas Comosus
description:
Welcome to the world of the pineapple. Long, long ago the pineapple civilisation was able to roam the beaches without a care in the world. But one fateful day the dragon tyrants invaded! Don't bump into the dragons but make sure to collect loads of food.If you're lucky and you're able to touch a bear guardian the enemies will flee. The arrowkeys control your movement. Hint: make sure to look out for yellow boxes

Long live the Pineapple Kindom!

-Sarah Lines
